title: Extreme weather.
Safe location.
Ultra-Wide Band.
step1.content:
An excellent app to detect and find nearby natural disaster risks.

Receive notifications instantly when threats are imminent. Quickly locate the local assembly point accurately and more.

title: Receive
Notifications
Before danger
approaches
step2.content:
From the local database, disasters are continuously updated on the system without affecting phone battery life.

This enables Noticast to deliver crucial notifications when needed.

title: Warm clothes.
Boots. Gloves.
Deal with all type of
weather conditions.
step3.content: The app also provides recommendations for clothing, attire, and transportation for various weather conditions.

NavigationAlertScreen.description: Assist you in moving precisely to the nearest assembly point for a quick evacuation in the face of extreme natural disaster risks.
NavigationAlertScreen.understandNavigation: Refer to the description for a better understanding of navigation.
